name: NO ONE LIKES A CAR WASH!
name_original: NO ONE LIKES A CAR WASH!
description:
Controls:

Movement - WASD

A short game to see how long you can survive without your car getting too dirty!

Soap cleans a little bit of your car.

Credits:

Music - Back in Toon

Background Image by user hassekf at OpenGamerArt.Org

Art made in FireAlpaca

Game Made in Pygame
